# Delegation of Areas of Responsibilities (AORs)

## Introduction

This repository provides an implementation of a backend web server which supports creation of custom areas of interests (regions) as well as the delegation of AORs to users. Users are also either Admin or Employee and can only perform tasks depending on the privilege level.

## Installation & Usage

### Postman & Environment

To use, go to the Postman collection linked below.  Make sure the 'Final Project' environment is selected.  The tests provided is currently the recommended way to interact with the webapp and the database.

[<img src="https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg" alt="Run In Postman" style="width: 128px; height: 32px;">](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/41740923-2e4216ea-8600-45db-951a-d65bd1125dfa?action=collection%2Ffork&source=rip_markdown&collection-url=entityId%3D41740923-2e4216ea-8600-45db-951a-d65bd1125dfa%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D28343dbb-b066-4e4e-8a52-e49a0e179c77#?env%5BFinal%20Project%)
